content:
Thabiso ‚ÄúProTee‚Äù Nkos is a Durban-based gqom DJ and music producer renowned for his dynamic contributions to the genre. Since the mid-2010s, he‚Äôs gained acclaim for his Boom-Base series and standout albums like Church Rhythms and Boom-Base Volume 2 
Apple¬†Music - Web Player
songs.co.za
.

ProTee brings a distinctive flair to gqom, blending pulsating basslines, rhythmic chants, and tribal percussive textures to create immersive tracks such as ‚ÄúAw Kodwa Loyiso (Gqom Remake)‚Äù and ‚ÄúS‚Äôbhonyelwe‚Äù 
Apple¬†Music - Web Player
bamoza.net
. His 2025 remix of ‚ÄúNgisakuthanda‚Äù transforms the heartfelt original into a club-ready anthem steeped in gqom‚Äôs relentless energy 
Gauteng Lifestyle Magazine
.

Beyond studio work, ProTee also captivates listeners through live performances and remix projects, reinforcing his influence on South Africa‚Äôs electronic music scene

bamoza.net.

title: Author Reading Event
description: Join us for an evening with bestselling author
content: Join us for an exclusive evening with bestselling author Sarah Johnson as she discusses her latest novel. This intimate gathering will include a reading, Q&A session, and book signing. Light refreshments will be served.

title: Library Renovation Complete
description: Our newly renovated reading spaces are now open
content: After months of renovation, our library's reading spaces are now complete and open to the public. The new design features modern furniture, improved lighting, and dedicated quiet zones for focused study. We've also added more power outlets and USB charging stations throughout the facility.

title: Children's Story Time
description: Weekly story time sessions for young readers
content: Join us every Saturday morning for our popular children's story time sessions. Our experienced librarians will read engaging stories, lead interactive activities, and help foster a love of reading in young children. Suitable for ages 3-8.

title: Library Reading Room
description: Our peaceful reading room with natural lighting
content: The main reading room features comfortable seating, natural lighting, and a quiet atmosphere perfect for focused study and reading.

title: Children's Section
description: Colorful and engaging children's reading area
content: Our dedicated children's section is designed to make reading fun and accessible for young learners.

title: Digital Learning Center
description: Modern computer workstations for digital research
content: Our digital learning center provides access to computers, online resources, and digital research tools.
